title: GetGoing
description: This Next.js and Supabase PostgreSQL task management web app features custom category, colour coding, deadline dates and much more. All components were written primarily in TypeScript, with Tailwind and Shadcn for styling.

title: Blogz
description: Blogz is a dynamic MERN stack social network application. Node and Express.js manage routes for user actions like post creation, likes, and deletion. Test Blogz with username & password as 'demo'.

title: Notifications
description: This is a Next.js social media notifications component based on an elegant Frontend Mentor design. The notification data is stored in JSON and handled dynamically in React client side components.

title: Countries API
description: Next.js app utilizes TypeScript, Tailwind, Framer Motion and the Countries API offering an interface for viewing country information, region-based filtering, and detailed country profiles, all served with infinite scroll.

title: Expenses Chart
description: Chart.js Next.js, TypeScript and Tailwind app dynamically presents JSON chart data. Bars represent the amount of spending per day. The current day, as per the user's locale, is highlighted with a different coloured bar.

title: News Homepage
description: This Next.js, TypeScript and Tailwind app includes a stunning and well laid out news homepage split into appropriate functional components. It offers interactive UI, seamless navigation, and looks superb across all devices.

title: The Dog Store
description: 200+ product WooCommerce store and large knowledgebase, owned by the UK's top dog behaviourist, Stan Rawlinson. Originally migrated from a 10-year-old failing Drupal store to WordPress and WooCommerce.

title: Pinewoods Property
description: Job board and business website for 40+ year old recruitment and property solutions business, Pinewoods. This was implemented via open source WordPress and hosted on an Ubuntu VPS environment.
